blogPost.excerpt: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.body: Flinkit! provides remote teams with fun and creative cooperation opportunities to enhance teamwork and trust. Teams can compete at the same time as they follow the carefully designed storyline solving highly visual tasks and riddles.
blogPost.title: The Firm by Flinkit! - Web-hosted team building mission for remote teams
blogPost.author: Peter Orban

localize.description: Flinkit！为远程团队提供趣味性和创造性的合作机会，增强团队合作和信任。团队可以在竞争的同时，按照精心设计的故事情节解决高度可视化的任务和谜语。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的网络托管团队建设任务。

localize.description: Flinkit！爲遠程團隊提供趣味性和創造性的合作機會，增強團隊合作和信任。團隊可以在競爭的同時，按照精心設計的故事情節解決高度可視化的任務和謎語。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的網絡託管團隊建設任務。

next.excerpt: A SaaS kit that might be the perfect starting point for your next React project. Save time and skip implementing features like authentication, payments, teams, and more so you can focus on building your SaaS.
next.title: Serverless SaaS - Building SaaS apps faster with React

localize.description: 一个SaaS套件，可能是你下一个React项目的完美起点。节省时间，跳过实施认证、支付、团队等功能，这样你就可以专注于构建你的SaaS。
一個SaaS套件，可能是你下一個React項目的完美起點。節省時間，跳過實施認證、支付、團隊等功能，這樣你就可以專注於構建你的SaaS。
